scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/util/constants.template.ts > src/util/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli.json src/util/constants.template.ts > src/util/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:polygon: mustache config/polygon.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/polygon.json src/util/constants.template.ts > src/util/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:optimism: mustache config/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/optimism.json src/util/constants.template.ts > src/util/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:local: mustache config/local.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/local.json src/util/constants.template.ts > src/util/constants.ts
